Alienation Of Affections.definition: the diversion of a person's affection from someone

1.1: the diversion of a person's affection from someone (as a spouse) who has certain rights or claims to such affection usu. to a third person who is held to be the instigator or cause of the diversion called also
1.note: In most jurisdictions alienation of affections is no longer recognized as a basis for a civil suit.
